AvrDudeSettings.title: Avrdudesettings
AvrDudeSettings.description: Settings for flashing Arduino devices with avrdude.

Attempts.title: Attempts
Attempts.description: Number of times AvrDude should retry connecting to the device. If omitted then -x attempts will not be passed to avrdude.

BaudRate.title: Baudrate
BaudRate.description: Baud rate to use with AvrDude. Deprecated. Use BaudRates instead.

BaudRates.title: Baudrates
BaudRates.description: All supported baud rates to use with AvrDude.

items.title: Items
items.description: A baud rate for communicating with the device.

Device.title: Device
Device.description: AvrDude device type for the device.

FirmwareBaseName.title: FirmwareBaseName
FirmwareBaseName.description: Base name for firmware files. Deprecated. Use Info.FirmwareBaseName instead.

Programmer.title: Programmer
Programmer.description: AvrDude programmer to use for the device.

Timeout.title: Timeout
Timeout.description: Number of milliseconds to wait before we assume the AvrDude process failed and has to get killed.

ResetFirmwareFile.title: Resetfirmwarefile
ResetFirmwareFile.description: Firmware filename to reset the board. Deprecated. Use Info.ResetFirmwareFile instead.

ConnectionDelay.title: Connectiondelay
ConnectionDelay.description: Number of milliseconds to wait before loading the configuration after initially connecting to the board.

DelayAfterFirmwareUpdate.title: Delayafterfirmwareupdate
DelayAfterFirmwareUpdate.description: Number of milliseconds to wait after a firmware update before attempting to reconnect to the board.

DtrEnable.title: Dtrenable
DtrEnable.description: True if DTR should be enabled when connecting to the board over serial.

EEPROMSize.title: Eepromsize
EEPROMSize.description: Maximum size of EEPROM storage, in bytes.

ExtraConnectionRetry.title: Extraconnectionretry
ExtraConnectionRetry.description: True if multiple attempts should be made when connecting to the board.

ForceResetOnFirmwareUpdate.title: Forceresetonfirmwareupdate
ForceResetOnFirmwareUpdate.description: True if a force reset should be done to the board before attempting to upload the firmware.

MessageSize.title: Messagesize
MessageSize.description: Maximum size of a CmdMessenger message, in bytes.

TimeoutForFirmwareUpdate.title: Timeoutforfirmwareupdate
TimeoutForFirmwareUpdate.description: Number of milliseconds to wait for the firmware update to complete before attempting to call GetInfo on the board. Default 15000.

HardwareIds.title: Hardwareids
HardwareIds.description: A list of regular expressions of USB hardware IDs that use this board definition.

items.title: Items
items.description: A regular expression that should match a VID/PID.

CanInstallFirmware.title: Caninstallfirmware
CanInstallFirmware.description: True if the board supports loading firmware via MobiFlight.

CanResetBoard.title: CanResetBoard
CanResetBoard.description: True if the board can be reset to factory default by MobiFlight.

FirmwareBaseName.title: FirmwareBaseName
FirmwareBaseName.description: Base name for firmware files. The final filename is of the form {FirmwareBaseName}_{Version}.{FirmwareExtension}.

FirmwareExtension.title: FirmwareExtension
FirmwareExtension.description: File extension for firmware files. The final filename is of the form {FirmwareBaseName}_{Version}.{FirmwareExtension}.

FriendlyName.title: Friendlyname
FriendlyName.description: The USB friendly name for the board as specified by the board manufacturer.

LatestFirmwareVersion.title: Latestfirmwareversion
LatestFirmwareVersion.description: The latest supported version of the firmware.

MobiFlightType.title: Mobiflighttype
MobiFlightType.description: The type of the board as provided by the MobiFlight firmware.

ResetFirmwareFile.title: Resetfirmwarefile
ResetFirmwareFile.description: Firmware filename to reset the board. Deprecated. Use Info.ResetFirmwareFile instead.

ModuleLimits.title: Modulelimits
ModuleLimits.description: Maximum number of each type of module supported by the board.

MaxAnalogInputs.title: Maxanaloginputs
MaxAnalogInputs.description: Maximum number of analog inputs supported by the board.

MaxButtons.title: Maxbuttons
MaxButtons.description: Maximum number of buttons supported by the board.

MaxEncoders.title: Maxencoders
MaxEncoders.description: Maximum number of encoders supported by the board.

MaxLcdI2C.title: Maxlcdi2c
MaxLcdI2C.description: Maximum number of I2C LCDs supported by the board.

MaxLedSegments.title: Maxledsegments
MaxLedSegments.description: Maximum number of LED segments supported by the board.

MaxOutputs.title: Maxoutputs
MaxOutputs.description: Maximum number of outputs supported by the board.

MaxServos.title: Maxservos
MaxServos.description: Maximum number of servos supported by the board.

MaxSteppers.title: Maxsteppers
MaxSteppers.description: Maximum number of steppers supported by the board.

MaxShifters.title: Maxshifters
MaxShifters.description: Maximum number of output shift registers supported by the board.

MaxInputShifters.title: MaxInputShifters
MaxInputShifters.description: Maximum number of input shift registers supported by the board.

MaxInputMultiplexer.title: MaxInputMuxes
MaxInputMultiplexer.description: Maximum number of digital input multiplexers supported by the board.

Pins.title: Pins
Pins.description: List of pins supported by the board.

isAnalog.title: Isanalog
isAnalog.description: True if the pin is an analog pin.

isPWM.title: Ispwm
isPWM.description: True if the pin supports PWM.

isI2C.title: Isi2c
isI2C.description: True if the pin is used for I2C communication.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Optional display name for the pin.

Pin.title: Pin
Pin.description: The number for the pin on the board.

UsbDriveSettings.title: UsbDriveSettings
UsbDriveSettings.description: Settings for flashing devices via a mounted USB drive.

Settings.title: VerificationFileName
Settings.description: The name of a file that must be present in the root directory of the USB drive for it to be considered, a match and able to be flashed.

VolumeLabel.title: VolumeLabel
VolumeLabel.description: Volume label of the USB drive when mounted in Windows.
